Michael Staehling

Front-End Web Developer

About Michael Staehling

I am a recent front end engineering graduate from The Iron Yard Orlando. I started my career as a delivery driver, but I have always had an interest in technology. With that interest, I felt it was time to change careers and pursue something that I would enjoy.

Portfolio

Here are some projects that I have worked on.

For my final project at The Iron Yard I built a web application for truck drivers. The prurpose of it is so they can post details about stops to help inform other drivers about potential safety issues or special delivery instructions for the stop.

Half way through school we were paired up for the first time to create something using api's. My group decided to make an app that promoted the idea of finding outdoor activities to do in the Orlando area.

One of my first projects was to build a chessboard.

Here is a link to download my resume to see my full work history.
